item.title: Report X-2024050296
item.description:
Report X-2024050296

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-10T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-02
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found on the dock during the preload sort with wet outer contents. Upon further inspection, it was found that the inner contents contained one gallon of flammable alcohol sanitizer missing its lid. Package was placed into a hazardous waste bag, and then into a salvage drum.
